attributes.action: ensure that all Members who have submitted questionable expenses be forced to repay the sums involved and face the appropriate legal action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am sure i am not alone in saying that apologies are not enough with regards to the current mp expenses scandal and feel that anyone found to have been dishonourable in this respect repay all sums to the country and face relevant legal procedure just as any normal uk citizen would have to in similar circumstances

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
